aka: The Finances of the Grand Duke Radicant Film
this_title: Die Finanzen des Großherzogs Radikant Film
trans_title: The Finances of the Grand Duke Radicant Film
introduction: Summer 2010, a vacant rokoko-chateau in Brandenburg. Theres not much going on in our minds, only TATORT, regional broadcasting and tabloids. Old gentry is called to safe the film. But their intentions turn out to differ from their promises.
chinese_title: Die Finanzen des Großherzogs Radikant Film
